New Records: Shubman Gill scored 126 off 63 balls in the match
Key Match Events: Daryl Mitchell was dismissed by Umran Malik for 35 runs
Hardik Pandya took 4 wickets for 16 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Shubman Gill was awarded the player of the match for his innings of 126 off 63 balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ben Lister made his T20I debut in this match
